extendedInfo.description: Goal of the game is to find out the 4 digit number chosen by computer.Computer will choose a 4 digit number where all the digits will be uniuqe (0..9).User needs to guess that 4 digit number by providing different 4 digit numbers.In response to user's number computer will provide hint to the user that- How many numbers are there at the same place in number chosen by computer.- How many numbers are there at different place in number chosen by computer.From this hint user needs to provide another guess applying logic.And so on to guess the correct number chosen by computer.User needs to apply maximum logic and minimum try to find out the correct number.So be prepared for the challenge.Wish you all the best.

reviews.comment: Mind blowing logic game. Initially it took 17-20 times to guess the number but now I am able to track the number in 7-8 trials.It really improve logic
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mind Game
reviews.comment: Nice Game 4 those who think they have a brain...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A great brain teaser. UI is too very clean.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simly superb. Initially little tough to understand... but thts the beauti of the game. Didnt look for any other game bcoz never find something is mis
